first_time.title: R6S - Crusader - First Time Setup
first_time.description:
**Error messages:**
> "Error Occured on Memory, Please Report Developer.": Try restarting the PC.
> "Host Folder Issue / etc error message":
> 1. Make sure you have unpacked the loader and are not opening it in the zip file.
> 2. Go to `C:\Windows\System32` and check if there is a folder named `etc`. If so, rename it to `etc2` and remove it.

steps.title: Uninstall Conflicting Programs
steps.description:
1. Press `Win + S` and type `Apps & Features`.
2. Open it and search for **Antivirus, Vanguard, Valorant, FACEIT AC, Counter-Strike**.
3. Click on them and select **Uninstall**.

steps.title: Disable Windows Defender
steps.description:
1. Download [`Sordum DefenderControl`](https://www.sordum.org/9480/defender-control/).
2. Open the tool and **disable Windows Defender**.

steps.title: Turn Off Kernel Protection
steps.description:
1. Press `Win + S`, type `cmd`, and **Right Click â†’ Run as Administrator**.
2. Copy & paste this command:
```cmd
bcdedit /set nointegritychecks on
```
3. Press **Enter** and restart your PC.

steps.title: Disable Firewall
steps.description:
1. Press `Win + S`, type `Firewall`, and open **Firewall & Network Protection**.
2. Turn off **Private & Public Network Firewall**.

steps.title: Disable UAC & Reputation-Based Protection
steps.description:
1. Press `Win + S`, type `UAC`, and **drag the slider to 'Never Notify'**.
2. Press `Win + S`, type `Reputation Based Protection`, and disable all options.

steps.title: Extra Step for Windows 11 Users
steps.description: 1. Press `Win + S`, type `Kernel Protection`, and ensure it is **disabled**.

steps.title: Check if `.exe` is correct
steps.description: Your `.exe` must be reviewed by our developer.

steps.title: Locate the Ubisoft/R6Siege Folder
steps.description:
1. Press `Win + R` to open **Run**.
2. Type `%localappdata%` and press **Enter**.
3. Find the folder **Ubisoft/R6Siege**.

steps.title: Upload Your `.exe`
steps.description:
1. If the file is found, **upload it to Google Drive**.
2. Set the file to **Public**.
3. Copy the **Google Drive Link**.

steps.title: Provide Key & Exact Problem Description
steps.description:
1. Submit your **Product Key** and **Google Drive Link**.
2. **Exact Problem Description**: Describe **exactly** what happens (error message, steps you tried, and system details).
